Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition: cuddlesome \cuddlesome\ cuddly \cuddly\adj. inviting cuddling or hugging; as, a cuddlesome baby. [WordNet 1.5]
cuddly adj : inviting cuddling or hugging; "a cuddlesome baby"; "a cuddly teddybear" [syn: {cuddlesome}]
